Contact Form

One of the most basic functionality of most websites is the contact form functionality. To do that, we have to set up back-end to each websites we build. To avoid repeated set-up for contact form, I made zoozler.com as an API. So that any websites Zoozler built can communicate with the API and provide all functionality for contact form.

HTML
<!-- In your html file. -->
<form post-contact data-to='destination-email' data-url='departure-url' novalidate>
	 <!-- Notification box to confirm the form -->
	 <div style='display: none' class='sent-notification'></div>
	 	 <!-- name tags should follow the following -->
	 	 <input name='name' type='text' required></input>
	 	 <!-- Only if email passes internal validation process, the contact will proceed. -->
	 	 <input name='email' type='text' required></input>
	 	 <input name='phone' ></input>
	 	 <textarea name='message' type='text' required></textarea>
	 <!-- Google Recaptcha Validation Form  -->
	 <div class='g-recaptcha' data-sitekey='authorized-sitekey-from-google'></div>
	 <!-- sally.js will place a 'click' event trigger automatically on the button below. -->
	 <button type='submit'>Submit</button>
</form>
...
<!-- To implement recaptcha you need a Google Recaptcha API javascript below. -->
<script src='https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js'></script>
CSS
/* In your css file. */
.alert-danger {
/* stiyle goes here if a form valid. */
}
.alert-success {
/* stiyle goes here if a form in valid. */
}
